mapper.select: SELECT APP_NO, PLAN_ID, APP_USER, APP_TYPE, APP_STATE, APP_TIME FROM OPM_APP WHERE APP_STATE = 2
select * from opm_plan_inf_app where app_no = #{appNo, jdbcType = INTEGER}

SELECT t.plan_id, prod_id, prod_name, t.plan_name, plan_location, plan_num, plan_eval_type, plan_type, mandatary_plan_id, acct_begin_date, confirm_flag, t.common_plan_id, soc_sec_day, soc_sec_stru, trustconno, submit_ctrl, accounting_flag, act_rate, act_date, unif_plan_name, unif_plan_id, unif_mandatary_id, unif_trustee_id, icbc_flag, plan_time, invest_preacct_flag, invest_defer, branch_id, t1.invest_id, t1.invest_name, trustee_id, trustee_name, investor_invest_id, offer_rate, pay_rate, t2.plan_name other_plan_name, t2.common_plan_id other_plan_id, trustee, TRUST, invest_num, primary_flag, t3.invest_id other_invest_id, t3.invest_name other_invest_name, t3.investor_id other_investor_id, t3.investor_name other_investor_name FROM (opm_plan_inf t INNER JOIN opm_invest_inf t1 ON t.plan_id = t1.plan_id) LEFT JOIN(opm_other_plan_inf t2 INNER JOIN opm_other_invest_inf t3 ON t2.plan_id = t3.plan_id AND t2.common_plan_id = t3.common_plan_id) ON t.plan_id = t2.plan_id WHERE t.plan_id = #{param1, jdbcType = VARCHAR} order by t1.invest_name, t3.invest_name
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO opm_plan_app (app_no, plan_id, prod_id, prod_name, plan_name, plan_location, plan_num, plan_eval_type, plan_type, mandatary_plan_id, acct_begin_date, confirm_flag, common_plan_id, soc_sec_day, soc_sec_stru, trustconno, submit_ctrl, accounting_flag, act_rate, act_date, unif_plan_name, unif_plan_id, unif_mandatary_id, unif_trustee_id, icbc_flag, plan_time, invest_preacct_flag, invest_defer, branch_id) VALUES (#{appNo, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, seq_id.nextval, #{prodId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{prodName, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{planName, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{planLocation, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{planNum, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{planEvalType, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{planType, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{mandataryPlanId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{acctBeginDate, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{confirmFlag, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{commonPlanId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{socSecDay, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{socSecStru, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{trustconno, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{submitCtrl, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, 'Y', #{actRate, jdbcType = NUMERIC}, #{actDate, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{unifPlanName, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{unifPlanId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{unifMandataryId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{unifTrusteeId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{icbcFlag, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{investPreacctFlag, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{investDefer, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{branchId, jdbcType = VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select app_no, plan_id, prod_id, prod_name, plan_name, plan_location, plan_num, plan_eval_type, plan_type, mandatary_plan_id, acct_begin_date, confirm_flag, common_plan_id, soc_sec_day, soc_sec_stru, trustconno, submit_ctrl, accounting_flag, act_rate, act_date, unif_plan_name, unif_plan_id, unif_mandatary_id, unif_trustee_id, icbc_flag, plan_time, invest_preacct_flag, invest_defer, branch_id from opm_plan_app where app_no = #{appNo, jdbcType = VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update opm_plan_app set prod_name = #{prodName, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, plan_name = #{planName, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, plan_location = #{planLocation, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, plan_num = #{planNum, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, plan_eval_type = #{planEvalType, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, plan_type = #{planType, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, mandatary_plan_id = #{mandataryPlanId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, acct_begin_date = #{acctBeginDate, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, confirm_flag = #{confirmFlag, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, common_plan_id = #{commonPlanId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, soc_sec_day = #{socSecDay, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, soc_sec_stru = #{socSecStru, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, trustconno = #{trustconno, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, submit_ctrl = #{submitCtrl, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, act_rate = #{actRate, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, act_date = #{actDate, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, unif_plan_name = #{unifPlanName, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, unif_plan_id = #{unifPlanId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, unif_mandatary_id = #{unifMandataryId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, unif_trustee_id = #{unifTrusteeId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, icbc_flag = #{icbcFlag, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, plan_time = #{planTime, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, invest_preacct_flag = #{investPreacctFlag, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, invest_defer = #{investDefer, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, branch_id = #{branchId, jdbcType = VARCHAR} where app_no = #{appNo, jdbcType = VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT t1.app_no, t1.plan_name, to_char(t.app_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') save_time FROM opm_app t, opm_plan_app t1 WHERE t.app_type = 'PLANBASIC' AND t.app_state = '1' AND t.app_no = t1.app_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO opm_plan_trd (trd_no, plan_id, prod_id, prod_name, plan_name, plan_location, plan_num, plan_eval_type, plan_type, mandatary_plan_id, acct_begin_date, confirm_flag, common_plan_id, soc_sec_day, soc_sec_stru, trustconno, submit_ctrl, accounting_flag, act_rate, act_date, unif_plan_name, unif_plan_id, unif_mandatary_id, unif_trustee_id, icbc_flag, plan_time, invest_preacct_flag, invest_defer, branch_id) VALUES (#{trdNo, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, seq_id.nextval, #{prodId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{prodName, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{planName, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{planLocation, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{planNum, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{planEvalType, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{planType, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{mandataryPlanId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{acctBeginDate, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{confirmFlag, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{commonPlanId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{socSecDay, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{socSecStru, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{trustconno, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{submitCtrl, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, 'Y', #{actRate, jdbcType = NUMERIC}, #{actDate, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{unifPlanName, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{unifPlanId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{unifMandataryId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{unifTrusteeId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{icbcFlag, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{investPreacctFlag, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{investDefer, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{branchId, jdbcType = VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select trd_no, plan_id, prod_id, prod_name, plan_name, plan_location, plan_num, plan_eval_type, plan_type, mandatary_plan_id, acct_begin_date, confirm_flag, common_plan_id, soc_sec_day, soc_sec_stru, trustconno, submit_ctrl, accounting_flag, act_rate, act_date, unif_plan_name, unif_plan_id, unif_mandatary_id, unif_trustee_id, icbc_flag, plan_time, invest_preacct_flag, invest_defer, branch_id from opm_plan_trd where trd_no = #{trdNo, jdbcType = VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update opm_plan_trd set prod_name = #{prodName, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, plan_name = #{planName, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, plan_location = #{planLocation, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, plan_num = #{planNum, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, plan_eval_type = #{planEvalType, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, plan_type = #{planType, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, mandatary_plan_id = #{mandataryPlanId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, acct_begin_date = #{acctBeginDate, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, confirm_flag = #{confirmFlag, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, common_plan_id = #{commonPlanId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, soc_sec_day = #{socSecDay, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, soc_sec_stru = #{socSecStru, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, trustconno = #{trustconno, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, submit_ctrl = #{submitCtrl, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, act_rate = #{actRate, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, act_date = #{actDate, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, unif_plan_name = #{unifPlanName, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, unif_plan_id = #{unifPlanId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, unif_mandatary_id = #{unifMandataryId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, unif_trustee_id = #{unifTrusteeId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, icbc_flag = #{icbcFlag, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, plan_time = #{planTime, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, invest_preacct_flag = #{investPreacctFlag, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, invest_defer = #{investDefer, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, branch_id = #{branchId, jdbcType = VARCHAR} where trd_no = #{trdNo, jdbcType = VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT t1.app_no, t2.plan_name, to_char(t.update_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') save_time FROM opm_trd t, opm_trd_rel_app t1, opm_plan_trd t2 WHERE t.trd_type = 'PLANBASIC' AND t.trd_state = 'PREPARED' AND t.trd_no = t1.trd_no AND t1.trd_no = t2.trd_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO opm_plan_inf (plan_id, prod_id, prod_name, plan_name, plan_location, plan_num, plan_eval_type, plan_type, mandatary_plan_id, acct_begin_date, confirm_flag, common_plan_id, soc_sec_day, soc_sec_stru, trustconno, submit_ctrl, accounting_flag, act_rate, act_date, unif_plan_name, unif_plan_id, unif_mandatary_id, unif_trustee_id, icbc_flag, plan_time, invest_preacct_flag, invest_defer, branch_id) VALUES (#{planId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{prodId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{prodName, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{planName, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{planLocation, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{planNum, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{planEvalType, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{planType, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{mandataryPlanId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{acctBeginDate, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{confirmFlag, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{commonPlanId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{socSecDay, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{socSecStru, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{trustconno, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{submitCtrl, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{accountingFlag, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{actRate, jdbcType = NUMERIC}, #{actDate, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{unifPlanName, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{unifPlanId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{unifMandataryId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{unifTrusteeId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{icbcFlag, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{planTime, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{investPreacctFlag, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{investDefer, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{branchId, jdbcType = VARCHAR} )
